content: great article Jeff Goins. In my personal experience,What I have learned is that there is a very thin line between “inspired from “ and “copied from”.We need to get inspired from great writers,get the way they process and articulate things.But after we get the process ,instead of “copying”,we should create our “original form” and craft using their guidelines as a reference.This is the only way to grow. Readers are never fools.They can easily differentiate if you are being yourself or you are trying to be someone else.Everyone is unique and everyone can well create unique things.
